Investor_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6.content: My reputation is built on a strong understanding of investment dynamics, emphasizing self-sufficiency and assertiveness in pursuit of maximum returns. During this investment, I effectively analyzed the trustee's proposed allocation plan, but I received only 40% of the profits instead of the promised 70%. This outcome leads me to reevaluate my decision-making process and the importance of choosing trustworthy trustees in the future. I remain focused on refining my investment strategy to ensure better outcomes.

Trustee_19.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19.content: Mateo Garcia's actions during this investment have significantly harmed his reputation due to a breach of trust and integrity. Although the investment outcome matched expectations, the unequal profit distribution of only 40% to me instead of the agreed 70% suggests dishonesty and a lack of transparency. This behavior raises serious concerns about his reliability and trustworthiness in future transactions, warranting a negative reputation update.
